data.text: I stayed here in February as I was having dental work nearby so didn‚Äôt choose this hotel myself. The amenities here are fabulous there‚Äôs a bar/bakery that‚Äôs open until 1am, hairdressers, spa, fully kitted gym, games room and really nice restaurant on site. The rooms are worn and need repairs the chair was broken and had cigarette burns in and the bed was super uncomfortable the light bulbs need to be changed also due to this I can‚Äôt rate higher then 3 stars. As students live here it‚Äôs very noisy in the evening and was difficult to sleep. My room wasn‚Äôt cleaned as I didn‚Äôt request it as didn‚Äôt know you had too so this isn‚Äôt the hotels fault. I recommend the deep tissue massage it was amazing and all hotel staff are lovely. There‚Äôs also a supermarket on site that sells all snacks and alcohol and cigarettes if that‚Äôs your thing and the prices are very cheap in Izmir.
data.title: Dental work stay

data.text: arrived this morning with my mum and brother , we booked a one bed by mistake, went too reception and was upgraded in minutes without any fee !! the help we got from EgE and Merig was the best service you could ask for , no hesitation they made sure our stay was going too be the best experience and most comfortable, we definitely will be back , all staff are helpful and very approachable and freindly, big thank you too the reception staff especially. katie and vicky
data.title: comfortable the rooms are fabulous üòç

data.text:
This hotel is ideal to stay in if you want to be slightly out of the city centre but on 10 minutes away in taxi there is also a metro station 3 min walk , the room was compact and very clean with balcony, kitchen and A/C. The shower was fantastic!!! 
Pool was perfect for a quick mor ingredients swim before delicious  breakfast in the restaurant 

The guys on reception were great and helped us book taxis and give us some great ideas and places to visit . 

They even arranged for the taxi to Izmir airport to stop at Ataturk mask for photos !!! Which worked out great .

Big thanks to Ege and Ali
data.title: Great staff on reception made our stay in Izmir wonderful

data.text:
I stayed in this place for 28 days with my family.  It was fantastic place to stay where my 3 children enjoyed in the swimming pool.  They also enjoyed the facilities for children and adult such as, table tennis, play station 4 , pool tables, and gym.  
The staffs were very nice and smiling at you.  Room services was performed by very kind and trust people.  There was a 24 hours security at the gate.  There was car parking for customers only.  There was a supermarket opened 24 hours.  The supermarket prices are similar to other supermarkets.  The metro station is very closed to the accommodation.  It was just 4 minutes walk from the accommodation.  I will stay in this place again for my next holiday in the future.  All room facilities were available, you can check the website.
data.title: Amazing accommodation for singles and families

data.text:
We stayed 5 days in two apartments in the complex, the apartments are equipped with a refrigerator, a washing machine, a pull-out sofa bed in the living room, air conditioning and a shower, the room was clean, there is a good pool in the complex, a new gym, a restaurant, a cafe and a supermarket.
The breakfast was good and it is served in the restaurant in the complex, there is also a spa with massages at good prices. The staff was kind and nice, walking distance of less than 5 minutes to the metro station, in addition there are always taxis in the area, the only downside is that during the entire time we stayed our rooms were not cleaned at all
data.title: Excellent apartment for families
